channel.title: Easy Error Help
channel.description:
Getting this error when I start my server making me not able to log in. I was adding D Claws through [url=http://www.runecheck.com/tutorials-f20/how-to-add-fully-working-dragon-claws-t111.htm]this tutorial[/url] and when I finished I compiled it fixed any errors I got and ran my server to get this error.
Error: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/iyczm9.png[/img]

item.title: Easy Error Help
item.dc:creator: @tbagu2 tbagu2
item.description:
@tbagu2 wrote:

Haha I think the first one is easyer to understand xD.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy Error Help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

ava.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException is being thrown because you didn’t use tabs while editing a cfg file (as this is where the error most commonly occurs in cfg folders), or the number 6 is to high. You should go look through the CFG folder that you just recently edited for any mistakes where you pressed the space bar when you should of pressed the tabs key.

OR, I could put it like this:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException was thrown to indicate that an array was accessed with an out of bounds index.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy Error Help
item.dc:creator: @tbagu2 tbagu2
item.description:
@tbagu2 wrote:

I know what cfg means but I am only new to coding but “you joking around” really did help xD.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy Error Help
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

You havent Tabbed properly when declaring the item in your cfg file

english translator

You = You.
havent = have not.
Tabbed = tabbed as in pressing the tab key.
when = when as in (e.g. he paid the delivery guy WHEN the pizza came).
declaring = saying something is something(e.g. int Pizza = 5).
the = the.
item = the item as in d claws
in = in, as in inside the file.
your = your, to show ownership of something.
cfg = cfg also known as cinfig,cinfiguration. To show extension as in .cfg.
file = file(e.g. client.java is a file).

Basically you didnt Tab when you made th item in item.cfg

all of that was just me kidding but you should learn what words like declare and cfg means for rsps codeing.

Read full topic

So in english I haven’t put the item in the correct place?
